## Client.deleteDB() method

Deletes an entire DB.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deleteDB(threadID: ThreadID): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  threadID | ThreadID | the ID of the database. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
